credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Man with a Knapsack
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
medium: Brush and oil paint on canvas
description: Horizontal view of a man, in center of canvas, with a reddish-brown beard, grey coat, dark trousers, soft hat, staff, and knapsack, standing on cut-over hillside, facing left.  Shrubs and trees, some with leaves turned with color, on brow of hill.
name: Painting
